#summary Maven coordinates and download statistics

== Download for Maven Projects ==

Concurrent-Trees is in Maven Central, and can be added to a Maven project as follows:
{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.googlecode.concurrent-trees</groupId>
    <artifactId>concurrent-trees</artifactId>
    <version>2.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

== Download for Non-Maven Projects ==
For non-Maven projects, the library can be downloaded directly from [https://code.google.com/p/concurrent-trees/downloads/list here].
